#summary List with the API methods.
#labels Phase-Implementation,Draft

|| *Path*                               || *Method* || *Action*                                         || *Parameters*             ||
|| `/api/devices`                       || `POST`   || Create device                                    || identifier<br/> name     ||
|| `/api/devices/(.*)`                  || `GET`    || Get device                                       ||                          ||
|| `/api/devices/(.*)`                  || `PUT`    || Update device                                    || identifier<br/> name     ||
|| `/api/devices/(.*)/lists`            || `GET`    || Get lists for device                             ||                          ||
|| `/api/lists`                         || `POST`   || Create list                                      || title<br/> owner         ||
|| `/api/lists/(.*)`                    || `GET`    || Get list and items of list                       ||                          ||
|| `/api/lists/(.*)`                    || `PUT`    || Update list                                      || title                    ||
|| `/api/lists/(.*)/push`               || `POST`   || Push unread count and log as alert to devices    || exclude                  ||
|| `/api/lists/(.*)/read`               || `PUT`    || Mark all items of that list as read              || device                   ||
|| `/api/items`                         || `POST`   || Create item                                      || value<br/> list          ||
|| `/api/items/(.*)`                    || `GET`    || Get item                                         ||                          ||
|| `/api/items/(.*)`                    || `PUT`    || Update item                                      || value<br/> list          ||

==Example==

{{{
POST /api/devices HTTP/1.1
Host: lightning-app.appspot.com
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

name=Test&identifier=123456
}}}

{{{
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8
Cache-Control: no-cache
Expires: Fri, 01 Jan 1990 00:00:00 GMT
Date: Sat, 28 Aug 2010 12:30:02 GMT
Server: Google Frontend
Connection: close

{"url": "https://lightning-app.appspot.com/api/devices/1?secret=abc", "secret": "abc", "id": 1}
}}}
